language.name: jxpath
language.title: JXPath
language.description: Camel JXPath support

parameter.name: expression
parameter.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

parameter.name: trim
parameter.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sets the id of this node

parameter.name: lenient
parameter.description: Allows to turn lenient on the JXPathContext. When turned on this allows the JXPath expression to evaluate against expressions and message bodies which may be invalid / missing data. This option is by default false

parameter.name: headerName

parameter.name: trim

parameter.name: id

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Sets the class name of the result type (type from output) The default result type is NodeSet

language.name: tokenize
language.title: Tokenize
language.description: The Core Camel Java DSL based router

parameter.name: endToken
parameter.description: The end token to use as tokenizer if using start/end token pairs.

parameter.name: regex
parameter.description: If the token is a regular expression pattern. The default value is false

parameter.name: headerName
parameter.description: Name of header to tokenize instead of using the message body.

parameter.name: expression
parameter.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

parameter.name: includeTokens
parameter.description: Whether to include the tokens in the parts The default value is false

parameter.name: trim
parameter.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

parameter.name: xml
parameter.description: Whether the input is XML messages. This option must be set to true if working with XML payloads.

parameter.name: inheritNamespaceTagName
parameter.description: To inherit namepaces from a root/parent tag name

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sets the id of this node

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The (start) token to use as tokenizer for example \n for a new line token

parameter.name: group
parameter.description: To group N parts together for example to split big files into chunks of 1000 lines.

language.name: xpath
language.title: XPath
language.description: The Core Camel Java DSL based router

parameter.name: headerName
parameter.description: Name of header to use as input instead of the message body

parameter.name: expression
parameter.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

parameter.name: trim
parameter.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

parameter.name: documentType
parameter.description: Name of class for document type The default value is org.w3c.dom.Document

parameter.name: objectModel
parameter.description: The XPath object model to use

parameter.name: logNamespaces
parameter.description: Whether to log namespaces which can assist during trouble shooting

parameter.name: factoryRef
parameter.description: References to a custom XPathFactory to lookup in the registry

parameter.name: saxon
parameter.description: Whether to use Saxon.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sets the id of this node

parameter.name: resultType
parameter.description: Sets the class name of the result type (type from output) The default result type is NodeSet

language.name: xtokenize
language.title: XML Tokenize
language.description: The Core Camel Java DSL based router

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: The extraction mode. The available extraction modes are: i - injecting the contextual namespace bindings into the extracted token (default) w - wrapping the extracted token in its ancestor context u - unwrapping the extracted token to its child content t - extracting the text content of the specified element

parameter.name: headerName
parameter.description: Name of header to tokenize instead of using the message body.

parameter.name: expression
parameter.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

parameter.name: trim
parameter.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sets the id of this node

parameter.name: group
parameter.description: To group N parts together

language.name: bean
language.title: Bean method
language.description: The Core Camel Java DSL based router

parameter.name: ref
parameter.description: Reference to bean to lookup in the registry

parameter.name: expression
parameter.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

parameter.name: method
parameter.description: Name of method to call

parameter.name: trim
parameter.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sets the id of this node

parameter.name: bean
parameter.description: Either a reference or a class name of the bean to use

parameter.name: beanType
parameter.description: Class name of the bean to use
